test-set.name: st-result-document
test-set.description: Tests xsl:stream instruction introduced in XSLT 3.0 with xsl:result-document.

test-case.name: st-index-of-001
test-case.description: Streaming - calling index-of - first arg is a consuming attribute sequence

test-case.name: st-index-of-002
test-case.description: Streaming - calling index-of - first arg is motionless, second is consuming
